Package student_package

Class CrudView

java.lang.Object
student_package.CrudView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CrudView extends Object implements Serializable
The `CrudView` class is a managed bean in a JavaServer Faces (JSF) application responsible for managing student data and interactions with the user interface. It integrates with a database using a DataSource to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on student records. This class also handles account creation for students and provides methods to manage student data.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kilyan Bentchakal

    • setDataSource

      public void setDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
      Sets the DataSource for the CRUD operations to be performed on the student records.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - The DataSource to be set.

    • getDataSource

      public DataSource getDataSource()
      Retrieves the current DataSource used for CRUD operations on student records.
      Returns:
      The current DataSource.

    • getCurrentStudent

      public Student getCurrentStudent()
      Retrieves the currently selected student.
      Returns:
      The currently selected student.

    • setCurrentStudent

      public void setCurrentStudent(Student currentStudent)
      Sets the currently selected student.
      Parameters:
      currentStudent - The student to be set as currently selected.

    • isCreateAccountCheck

      public boolean isCreateAccountCheck()
      Checks whether the "Create Account" checkbox is checked or not.
      Returns:
      true if the checkbox is checked, false otherwise.

    • setCreateAccountCheck

      public void setCreateAccountCheck(boolean createAccountCheck)
      Sets the state of the "Create Account" checkbox.
      Parameters:
      createAccountCheck - The new state of the checkbox.

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the managed bean after construction. It performs the necessary setup, such as looking up the DataSource and initializing the student table.

    • getStudents

      public List<Student> getStudents()
      Retrieves the list of students from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects representing the student records.

    • getSelectedStudent

      public Student getSelectedStudent()
      Retrieves the list of selected student.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects representing the selected students.

    • setSelectedStudent

      public void setSelectedStudent(Student selectedStudent)
      Sets the list of selected students.
      Parameters:
      selectedStudent - A list of Student objects to be set as selected students.

    • getSelectedStudents

      public List<Student> getSelectedStudents()
      Retrieves the list of selected students.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects representing the selected students.

    • setSelectedStudents

      public void setSelectedStudents(List<Student> selectedStudents)
      Sets the list of selected students.
      Parameters:
      selectedStudents - A list of Student objects to be set as selected students.

    • openNew

      public void openNew()
      Initializes a new student instance and sets its account creation status to "NotCreated." This function is used when opening a new student creation dialog.

    • createStudentAccount

      public void createStudentAccount()
      Creates a student account for the current student if the account doesn't already exist. It also updates the student's information and triggers an AJAX update of the user interface.

    • saveStudent

      public void saveStudent()
      Saves or updates a student's information. If the student has no ID, a new student is added to the list. If the "Create Account" checkbox is checked, an account is created for the student. This function also triggers an AJAX update of the user interface and displays appropriate messages.

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent()
      Deletes the selected student from the list of students. This function also triggers an AJAX update of the user interface and displays a message.

    • getDeleteButtonMessage

      public String getDeleteButtonMessage()
      Retrieves the message to be displayed on the "Delete" button. It varies based on the number of selected students.
      Returns:
      The appropriate message for the button.

    • hasSelectedStudents

      public boolean hasSelectedStudents()
      Checks if there are any selected students.
      Returns:
      true if there are selected students, false otherwise.

    • deleteSelectedStudents

      public void deleteSelectedStudents()
      Deletes the selected students from both the database and the list of students. This function also triggers an AJAX update of the user interface and displays a message.

    • checkInitTable

      public void checkInitTable()
      Checks if the "Student" table exists in the database, and creates it if it doesn't exist.

    • AddStudent

      public void AddStudent(Student selectedStudent)
      Inserts a new student record into the database.
      Parameters:
      selectedStudent - The student to be added to the database.

    • DeleteStudents

      public void DeleteStudents(List<Student> selectedStudents)
      Deletes a list of students from the database.
      Parameters:
      selectedStudents - The list of students to be deleted from the database.

    • UpdateStudent

      public void UpdateStudent(Student currentStudent)
      Updates a student's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      currentStudent - The student with updated information to be stored in the database.

    • getStudentsTable

      public List<Student> getStudentsTable()
      Retrieves a list of students from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects representing the student records from the database.
